title: Fragment, ca. 1700
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: ciselé voided satin velvet.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Pilaster-like pattern of large-scale leaves and flowers in green ciselé velvet on yellow satin ground.  Satin ground originally shot through with flat strips of gold, which is now almost entirely worn away.
